alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:32PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oneida County through 115 PM EDT... At 1232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westmoreland, or near Rome, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utica, Rome, Kirkland, Verona, Westmoreland, Trenton, Deerfield, Floyd, Whitesboro and New York Mills. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 31 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
